decks.notes: This Dimir Aggro deck focuses on taking advantage of powerful creatures like Murktide Regent and Troll of Khazad-d√ªm to apply pressure on the opponent quickly. The deck also includes disruptive spells like Force of Will and Daze to control the game and protect its threats. With a mix of card draw, removal, and graveyard recursion, this deck aims to maintain tempo and overwhelm the opponent before they can fully set up their own game plan. By efficiently utilizing resources and applying constant pressure, this deck aims to secure victory in Legacy 1 vs 1 matches.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by using various counterspells, removal spells, and card draw effects to disrupt the opponent's strategy. It utilizes a mix of creatures, such as Orcish Bowmasters and Samwise the Stouthearted, alongside powerful spells like Force of Will and Swords to Plowshares to maintain control of the battlefield. The mana base is designed to support the deck's strategy by providing a mix of colored mana sources and utility lands like Wasteland to disrupt the opponent's mana base.

This deck focuses on using a variety of control spells and creatures to disrupt the opponent's strategy while maintaining card advantage and tempo. The key concept is to establish early control with cards like Leyline of the Guildpact and Force of Will, then gradually build up a board presence with efficient creatures like Scion of Draco and Territorial Kavu. By using a mix of removal spells, counterspells, and card draw, the deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent until it can secure a win condition through card advantage or creature damage.

This deck focuses on utilizing mana acceleration and efficient creature threats to control the game and outvalue the opponent. It uses cards like Gaea's Cradle and Elvish Reclaimer to ramp up quickly, while also having access to powerful creatures like Endurance and Craterhoof Behemoth to apply pressure. Cards like Green Sun's Zenith and Natural Order provide flexibility in tutoring for the right threats at the right time. The deck also has disruption elements with cards like Collector Ouphe and Orcish Bowmasters to disrupt the opponent's game plan.

Utilizing powerful creatures like Death's Shadow and Murktide Regent alongside disruptive spells like Force of Will and Grief, this deck aims to apply early pressure and disrupt the opponent's game plan. With a focus on aggressive plays and resource denial through cards like Wasteland and Daze, this deck seeks to close out games quickly while controlling the board state. Reanimating creatures and utilizing card draw spells like Ponder and Brainstorm, this deck aims to efficiently execute its game plan and overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize.

The main concept of this Dragon Stompy deck is to disrupt the opponent's strategy by playing cards like Chalice of the Void and Trinisphere early on, while ramping up with mana acceleration cards like Simian Spirit Guide and Ancient Tomb. The deck aims to lock down the opponent's resources with cards like Blood Moon and Magus of the Moon, while applying pressure with aggressive creatures like Goblin Rabblemaster and Broadside Bombardiers. Additionally, the deck includes burn spells like Shatterskull Smashing and Fury to deal direct damage to the opponent and control the board.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by using lands to disrupt the opponent's game plan while utilizing cards like Crop Rotation, Exploration, and Life from the Loam to generate value and gain advantage. It aims to lock the opponent out of resources with cards like Wasteland, Sphere of Resistance, and The Tabernacle at Pendrell Vale, while also threatening a quick win condition with Dark Depths and Thespian's Stage. The deck has a flexible game plan that can adapt to different matchups and strategies, making it a powerful and versatile control deck in the Legacy format.

The deck focuses on utilizing the combo of Painter's Servant and Grindstone to mill the opponent's deck quickly. It also includes Goblin Engineer and Goblin Welder to help fetch the combo pieces from the deck or graveyard. The deck has a strong control element with Pyroblast and Red Elemental Blast to disrupt the opponent's spells. It also includes tools like Ensnaring Bridge and Karn, the Great Creator to slow down aggressive strategies. Overall, the deck aims to assemble its combo quickly while disrupting the opponent's game plan.

This deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with a fast and aggressive Goblin tribal strategy. By playing powerful Goblin creatures like Goblin Rabblemaster and Muxus, Goblin Grandee, supported by ramp cards like Simian Spirit Guide and Chrome Mox, the deck aims to quickly build a board presence and deal damage before the opponent has a chance to establish their game plan. The inclusion of cards like Chalice of the Void and Cavern of Souls helps to disrupt the opponent's strategy and protect the Goblins from removal spells.
